cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: irradiance wavelengths shift fitted values per subwindow

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: irradiance wavelengths squeeze fitted values per subwindow

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: calibration wavelength center in each subwindow

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: radiance wavelength shift from the doas fit

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: radiance wavelength squeeze/stretch from the doas fit

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: root mean square from the doas fit

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: slant columns of all absorbers: glyoxal, O3, NO2_220K, NO2_296K, H2O, O4, Ring, Liquid Water, Offset_0, Offset_1, resol, common residual, scene_heterogeneity1, scene_heterogeneity2

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: slant columns errors of all absorbers: glyoxal, O3, NO2_220K, NO2_296K, H2O, O4, Ring, Liquid Water, Offset_0, Offset_1, resol, common residual, scene_heterogeneity1, scene_heterogeneity2

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: a priori profile (vmr) interpolated in space and time on ground pixel

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Pressure grid of a priori profile (Pa) interpolated in space and time on ground pixel

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: systematic error of the slant column density

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: systematic error of the air mass factor for the kernel tropospheric glyoxal

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: random error of the tropospheric air mass factor

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: systematic error of the tropospheric air mass factor

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: systematic error of the air mass factor for the kernel tropospheric glyoxal

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Systematic error of vertical column density

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: 0: homogeneous scene; large values: degree of heterogeneity (+/-1 max)

cd:Attribute.name: source
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Computed using small radiance measurements, given in L1 files.

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: The altitude of the spacecraft relative to the WGS84 reference ellipsoid

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Latitude of the spacecraft sub-satellite point on the WGS84 reference ellipsoid

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Longitude of the spacecraft sub-satellite point on the WGS84 reference ellipsoid

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Relative offset (0.0 ... 1.0) of the measurement in the orbit

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Solar azimuth angle at the ground pixel location on the reference ellipsoid. Angle is measured clockwise from the North (East = 90, South = 180, West = 270)

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Solar zenith angle at the ground pixel location on the reference ellipsoid. Angle is measured away from the vertical

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Satellite azimuth angle at the ground pixel location on the reference ellipsoid. Angle is measured clockwise from the North (East = 90, South = 180, West = 270)

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Zenith angle of the satellite at the ground pixel location on the reference ellipsoid. Angle is measured away from the vertical

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: reference tropospheric column in the reference sector

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Systematic error of the reference tropospheric column in the reference sector

cd:Attribute.name: source
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Extracted from S5p NO2 OFL product

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Retrieved effective radiometric cloud fraction derived in NO2 fitting window

cd:Attribute.name: source
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Extracted from S5p NO2 OFL product

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Retrieved atmospheric pressure at the level of cloud.

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: flag indicating whether center of ground pixel is over lands or oceans

cd:Attribute.name: source
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Derived from surface_classification variable in S5p Operational OFL NO2 Product

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: flag indicating snow/ice at center of ground pixel

cd:Attribute.name: source
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: snow/ice variable in S5p Operational OFL NO2 product

cd:Attribute.name: source
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Surface classification variable extracted from S5p Operational OFL NO2 product

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This coordinate variable defines the indices for the pixel corners; index starts a 0 (counter-clockwise, starting from south-western corner of the pixel in ascending part of the orbit).

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: offset from reference start time of measurement

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: random error of vertical column density

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This coordinate variable defines the indices across track, from west to east; index starts at 0

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: A continuous quality descriptor, varying between 0 (no data) and 1 (full quality data). Recommend to ignore data with qa_value < 0.5

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This coordinate variable defines the indices along track; index starts at 0

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: The time in this variable corresponds to the time in the time_reference global attribute
